about_the_game:
Shattered Spines is a fast-paced, precision platformer designed specifically for speedrunners. Run, jump, dash, and slide through each level. Each map is short but packed with opportunities to shave off precious seconds as you race against the clock. Set a personal best or compete globally for the fastest times! Perfect your technique, push your limits, and join the race for the top spot!

Intense, Bite-Sized Levels

Each level is short but packed with challenges. They’re designed for speedrunners, where every second is an opportunity to shave off time. Quick to start, impossible to put down, and endlessly replayable.

Compete Across the Globe

Compete against other speedrunners around the world, rise to the top of the leaderboard, and prove your mastery of every level.

Built for Speedrunning

Shattered Spines was built with speedrunners in mind. Whether you’re grinding to beat your personal best or chasing glory on the global stage, every second is a thrilling challenge.

Evolving Visuals

The game is constantly improving. Current assets are placeholders, but the final version promises stunning visuals to match the intensity of the gameplay. Stay tuned for updates as Shattered Spines evolves!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Early Access, specifications are subject to change. Requirements are based on achieving consistent 60 FPS gameplay
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, AMD Radeon HD 7850, or newer integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Early Access, specifications are subject to change. Requirements are based on achieving consistent 60 FPS gameplay

short_description: Shattered Spines is a high-speed platformer built for speedrunners. Dash, jump, and slide through short, challenging maps and compete for the best times.
